headline.main: Postal Service Proposes Small Price Increases on Postage
headline.print_headline: Postal Service Proposes Small Price Increases on Postage

docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. Postal Service on Thursday proposed slight increases for mailing postcards and international letters — but wants to leave first-class "Forever" stamps at their present 49 cents.
docs.snippet: The U.S. Postal Service on Thursday proposed slight increases for mailing postcards and international letters — but wants to leave first-class "Forever" stamps at their present 49 cents....

headline.main: Smooth Draw for Djokovic at Australian Open
headline.print_headline: Smooth Draw for Djokovic at Australian Open

docs.lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic's chances of winning a fifth Australian Open title have been boosted by a kind draw in the opening week, while women’s top seed Serena Williams kicks off her campaign against 106th-ranked Belgian Alison Van Uytvanck.
docs.snippet: Novak Djokovic's chances of winning a fifth Australian Open title have been boosted by a kind draw in the opening week, while women’s top seed Serena Williams kicks off her campaign against 106th-ranked Belgian Alison Van Uytvanck....

headline.main: 'Deadliest Catch' Crabber Sues Over Fireworks Injury
headline.print_headline: 'Deadliest Catch' Crabber Sues Over Fireworks Injury

docs.lead_paragraph: A crab fisherman featured on the Discovery Channel's "Deadliest Catch" TV show is suing his former employers over a fireworks injury he suffered aboard the Time Bandit in 2013.
docs.snippet: A crab fisherman featured on the Discovery Channel's "Deadliest Catch" TV show is suing his former employers over a fireworks injury he suffered aboard the Time Bandit in 2013....

headline.main: Poland's 'Ida' Gets Big Oscar Bang by Staying Small
headline.print_headline: Poland's 'Ida' Gets Big Oscar Bang by Staying Small

docs.lead_paragraph: As Polish-British filmmaker Pawel Pawlikowski reflected on the two Oscar nominations scored by his austere black-and-white drama "Ida" on Thursday, he considered the irony of how his little film landed him his biggest success.
docs.snippet: As Polish-British filmmaker Pawel Pawlikowski reflected on the two Oscar nominations scored by his austere black-and-white drama "Ida" on Thursday, he considered the irony of how his little film landed him his biggest success....

headline.main: Sirius XM Is Dealt New Setback in Turtles Copyright Lawsuit
headline.print_headline: Sirius XM Is Dealt New Setback in Turtles Copyright Lawsuit

docs.lead_paragraph: A New York federal judge on Thursday largely rejected Sirius XM Holdings Inc's request to reconsider her Nov. 14 decision in favor of members of the 1960s band The Turtles over the payment of royalties for songs made before 1972.
docs.snippet: A New York federal judge on Thursday largely rejected Sirius XM Holdings Inc's request to reconsider her Nov. 14 decision in favor of members of the 1960s band The Turtles over the payment of royalties for songs made before 1972....

headline.main: Oklahoma Wants Ruling From US Supreme Court Before Execution
headline.print_headline: Oklahoma Wants Ruling From US Supreme Court Before Execution

docs.lead_paragraph: Oklahoma's first execution since a botched one last April appears headed for a delay.
docs.snippet: Oklahoma's first execution since a botched one last April appears headed for a delay....

headline.main: Monsanto Gets US Approval for New GMO Seeds
headline.print_headline: Monsanto Gets US Approval for New GMO Seeds

docs.lead_paragraph: Agriculture business giant Monsanto Co. said Thursday it received approval from the Department of Agriculture for new cotton and soybean seeds designed to be used with a new herbicide formula.
docs.snippet: Agriculture business giant Monsanto Co. said Thursday it received approval from the Department of Agriculture for new cotton and soybean seeds designed to be used with a new herbicide formula....

headline.main: Wisconsin Suspect Nabbed When Prosthetic Leg Gets Stuck in Fence
headline.print_headline: Wisconsin Suspect Nabbed When Prosthetic Leg Gets Stuck in Fence

docs.lead_paragraph: A suspect in western Wisconsin led police on a high-speed car chase on slick rural highways only to be caught after his prosthetic leg got stuck in a fence when he fled his vehicle, court documents showed on Thursday.
docs.snippet: A suspect in western Wisconsin led police on a high-speed car chase on slick rural highways only to be caught after his prosthetic leg got stuck in a fence when he fled his vehicle, court documents showed on Thursday....

headline.main: Cuomo Nomination Tips N.Y. Top Court to Democratic Majority
headline.print_headline: Cuomo Nomination Tips N.Y. Top Court to Democratic Majority

docs.lead_paragraph: New York's top state court, controlled by Republicans for more than a decade, will likely have a wide Democratic majority after Governor Andrew Cuomo on Thursday nominated a longtime judge to a vacancy.
docs.snippet: New York's top state court, controlled by Republicans for more than a decade, will likely have a wide Democratic majority after Governor Andrew Cuomo on Thursday nominated a longtime judge to a vacancy....
